name: Hal Robson
introduction: Hal Robson (born 16 August 1911 and died 2 July 1996) was a Canadian-American racing driver who was mainly active in the 1940s. He started in 3 Indianapolis 500 races between 1946 and 1948, but failed to finish any of them due to mechanical failures. He also unsuccessfully tried to qualify for the 1953 Indianapolis 500.
